text: Yanzu ina shirin ginin haikali domin Sunan Ubangiji Allahna, in kuma keɓe shi gare shi don ƙona turare mai ƙanshi a gabansa, don kuma ajiyar burodi mai tsarki kullum, da kuma don miƙa hadayun ƙonawa kowace safiya, kowace yamma, da a Asabbatai da Sababbin Wata, da kuma a ƙayyadaddun bukukkuwan Ubangiji Allahnmu. Wannan dawwammamiyar farilla ce don Isra’ila.
